Lenovo is a global technology powerhouse focused on delivering Smarter Technology for All. They are seeking a motivated Marketing Analytics Intern for Summer 2026 to support their Marketing Team by working on impactful projects in digital marketing, data analysis, and project management.


Responsibilities

  • Assist in the development and execution of marketing campaigns and marketing events
  • Conduct market research and competitive analysis to support marketing strategies
  • Design and develop a comprehensive marketing dashboard to track, analyze key performance metrics, and conduct A/B testing for marketing success
  • Monitor, report, and analyze the performance of marketing initiatives, providing insights and recommendations for improvement
  • Assist with administrative tasks and other duties assigned

Skills

  • Currently pursuing a degree in Marketing, Marketing Analytics, Statistics, Data Science, or a related field
  • Strong interest in digital marketing, data, and technology
  • Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Power BI and Power Automate)
  • Strong analytical, data forward problem-solving skills
  • Detail-oriented with strong organizational skills
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team
  • Familiarity with marketing tools and platforms (Marketo, Google Analytics, social media management tools, etc.)
  • Proficiency in Business Intelligence tools (Tableau, Domo, Power BI, etc.)
  • Proficiency in SQL and/or Python

Company Overview

  • Lenovo Group is a computer technology company that manufactures personal computers, smartphones, televisions, and wearable devices. It was founded in 1984, and is headquartered in Beijing, Beijing, CHN, with a workforce of 10001+ employees. Its website is https://www.lenovo.com/in/en/.

    • Company H1B Sponsorship

  • Lenovo has a track record of offering H1B sponsorships, with 76 in 2025, 52 in 2024, 75 in 2023, 82 in 2022, 58 in 2021, 67 in 2020. Please note that this does not guarantee sponsorship for this specific role.
